    • Method Detail

      • daysBetweenDates

        public static int daysBetweenDates(long toDate,
                                   long fromDate)
        number of days between two dates. time part is ignored from both dates. If you want to consider time as well, then use elapsedDaysBetweenDates()
        Parameters:
        toDate - note that this is long - date in milliseconds (date.getTime())
        fromDate - note that this is long - date in milliseconds (date.getTime())
        Returns:
        number of days as counted from date to date, and not based on time.

      • daysFromToday

        public static int daysFromToday(long toDate)
        number of days the supplied date is from today in the future. same as date - today.
        Parameters:
        toDate - note that this is long - date in milliseconds (date.getTime())
        Returns:
        number of days as counted from today forward into toDate. If toDate is the past, returned value is -ve.

      • elapsedDaysBetweenDates

        public static int elapsedDaysBetweenDates(long toTime,
                                          long fromTime)
        number of elapsed days (completed 24 hours) between two specific time intervals.
        Parameters:
        toTime - note that this is long - date in milliseconds (date.getTime())
        fromTime - note that this is long - date in milliseconds (date.getTime())
        Returns:
        number of days counted as 1 for every 24 hours from startDate = toDate - fromDate

      • elapsedDaysBetweenDates

        public static int elapsedDaysBetweenDates(Date toDate,
                                          Date fromDate)
        number of elapsed days (completed 24 hours) between two specific time intervals.
        Parameters:
        toDate -
        fromDate -
        Returns:
        number of days counted as 1 for every 24 hours from startDate = toDate - fromDate
